thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 7 of 65
thread.title: Jessica F.
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Jessica F.

author: Jessica F.
title: Jessica F.
text: Jeff was so helpful! He made my wedding planning stress free and helped us book a great resort at a price everyone could afford. He went above and beyond to help us make sure everything we wanted is included in our packages, in budget and that we were happy. I will be recommending him to everyone who has a destination wedding. We are so excited to be getting married on the beach with our close friends and family :)
